description: Detects the use of NSudo tool for command execution
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: PUA - NSudo Execution
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\NSudo.exe" OR "*\\NSudoLC.exe" OR "*\\NSudoLG.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("NSudo.exe" OR "NSudoLC.exe" OR "NSudoLG.exe"))) AND process.command_line.text:("*\-U\:S\ *" OR "*\-U\:T\ *" OR "*\-U\:E\ *" OR "*\-P\:E\ *" OR "*\-M\:S\ *" OR "*\-M\:H\ *" OR "*\-U\=S\ *" OR "*\-U\=T\ *" OR "*\-U\=E\ *" OR "*\-P\=E\ *" OR "*\-M\=S\ *" OR "*\-M\=H\ *" OR "*\-ShowWindowMode\:Hide*"))
